{{Infobox Berry |name = #26 Tamato |image = [[File:Tamato.png]] |caption = This Berry is large and spicy. When eaten during the cold season, it warms the body from inside. |growtime = 2h 24m 0s |harvest = 25 berries |replant = 20% |mutation = 0.05% |points = 625 |flavor =
*20 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *0 sour }} '''Tamato''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding a [[Razz]] with at least 1 [[Pomeg]]. The [[Razz]] will then have a chance to mutate into this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 7 mins 10 secs || 23 mins 10 secs || 1 hour 6 mins 40 secs || 2 hours 24 mins - 4 hours 48 mins |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:TamatoTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:TamatoTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:TamatoTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 2 hours 24 mins -
4 hours 48 mins || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 1 hour 36 mins -
3 hours 12 mins || 20 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 1 hour 4 mins -
2 hours 8 mins || 13 mulch |} == Flow Chart == [[File:Tamato_Flow_Chart1.png|350px]]
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Tamato berries.
